optic.models.modelsGPU.edfa

edfa(Ei, Fs, G=20, NF=4.5, Fc=193100000000000.0, prec=<class 'numpy.complex128'>)

Implement simple EDFA model.

Parameters:

  • Ei (np.array) -- Input signal field.

  • Fs (scalar) -- Sampling frequency in Hz.

  • G (scalar, optional) -- Amplifier gain in dB. The default is 20.

  • NF (scalar, optional) -- EDFA noise figure in dB. The default is 4.5.

  • Fc (scalar, optional) -- Central optical frequency. The default is 193.1e12.

Returns:

Eo -- Amplified noisy optical signal.

Return type:

np.array
